column4: once you start thinking about all the stuff you'd want like superdriver, bluetooth, wireless keyboard and mouse (to keep the level of style) it gets expensive...
so it's low satisfaction because if you buy the base model you will want the extra stuff, but if you get it you didn't get a budget system anymore :( ;-)
my next desktop...when i'll have money
Would be a great environment, but something in my always rebels against the idea of going proprietry.
